# INFO to be entered in the Alfred Terminal settings (Kept here just for reference.) # alfredpreferences://navigateto/features>terminal --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
on alfred_script(shellCmd) # Launch Wezterm if needed (Appname is `WezTerm`, processname is `wezterm-gui`) tell application "WezTerm" to activate tell application "System Events" repeat while (name of first application process whose frontmost is true) is not "wezterm-gui" delay 0.05 end repeat end tell
# 1. use builtin to not trigger things like magic dashboard # 2. Add `clear` if it is just a `cd` command, because it looks cleaner set command to text 1 thru 2 of shellCmd if command is "cd" then set shellCmd to "builtin " & shellCmd & " && clear" end if
# DOCS https://wezfurlong.org/wezterm/cli/cli/send-text do shell script ("export PATH=/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin/:$PATH ;" Â¬ & "echo '" & shellCmd & "' | wezterm cli send-text --no-paste") end alfred_script
